Package org.shared.net.filter

A package of networking I/O filters.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Filter<I,O>
    Defines a networking I/O filter.
    FilterFactory<F extends Filter<I,O>,I,O,H extends ConnectionHandler<?>>
    Defines a factory for creating Filters.
    OobEvent
    Defines an Event for conveying out-of-band information that doesn't belong in data.
    OobFilter<I,O>
    Defines a Filter that requires special processing on OobEvents.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseOobEvent
    A minimal implementation of OobEvent that can be subclassed into user-defined events.
    ChainFilterFactory<I,O,H extends ConnectionHandler<?>>
    An implementation of FilterFactory that enables chaining of multiple underlying FilterFactorys.
    Filters
    A static utility class in support of filtering.
    FrameFilterFactory
    An implementation of FilterFactory for null-delimited byte frames.
    IdentityFilterFactory<T>
    An implementation of FilterFactory that creates identity filters, which simply pull values off of the input queue and push them onto the output queue.
    XmlFilterFactory
    An implementation of FilterFactory for reading and writing XML DOM Elements.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    OobEvent.OobEventType
    An enumeration of OobEvent types.

Package org.shared.net.filter Description

A package of networking I/O filters.
